notes:
Coverage goals:
- Buyback (instants/sorceries) — all five colors include buyback spell templates.
- Shadow — white/blue/black creatures receive shadow templates; green gets anti-shadow blocking lines; red focuses elsewhere (flowstone).
- Slivers — cross-color passive auras granting classic evergreen abilities and stat bumps.
- Licids — all five colors include a 'creature that can become an Aura' pattern with attach/revert text.
- Flowstone — red creatures with +X/-X activated pumps.
- En-Kor — white 'damage redirection' shield-setting activations.
Design notes:
- Costs are drawn from string pools so your generator can vary them per card.
- {SELF} stands in for the card's own name in your system; {X} scales off MV (your engine's numeric resolver).
- If any bucket is missing in your runtime, your engine's defaults should keep text valid, but all buckets referenced here are provided.
